titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Fitzhugh Quarrier, Class of 1935, Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Memoir Concerning His Service in World War II
Quarrier (Fitzhugh), Class of 1935, Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Memoir Concerning His Service in World War II
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:28

did.unittitle: Fitzhugh Quarrier, Class of 1935, Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, memoir concerning his service in World War II

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The material consists of a memoir written by Fitzhugh Quarrier (Yale 1935S) concerning his experiences during World War II.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 42-C (YRG 42-C), Materials documenting military and wartime experiences of members of the Yale community.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fitzhugh Quarrier, Class of 1935, Sheffield Scientific School, Yale University, Memoir Concerning His Service in World War II (RU 87). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The material consists of a memoir written by Fitzhugh Quarrier (Yale 1935S) concerning his experiences during World War II.

did.unittitle: Memoir of Fitzhugh Quarrier, Y. 1935S, during World War II
